hero.subtitle: Explore the biogas potential of 645 municipalities in São Paulo with integrated MCDA data and advanced analytics

features.sectionSubtitle: Powerful tools for complete biogas analysis

interactiveMap.title: Interactive Map
interactiveMap.description: Visualize and analyze the biogas potential of São Paulo municipalities in real-time with customizable data layers.
features: Filters by residue type and region

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Access detailed MCDA analyses and statistics on biogas production potential.

scientificDatabase.title: Scientific Database
scientificDatabase.description: Access the database with scientific references and methodologies used.

research.sectionSubtitle: Research Center for Biogas and Biomethane Potential
research.description: CP2B is a research project dedicated to analyzing the potential for biogas and biomethane production from organic waste in São Paulo state.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: We use multi-criteria analysis (MCDA) combined with geospatial data to evaluate the biogas potential of each municipality.

cta.title: Ready to explore?
cta.subtitle: Access the platform and discover the biogas potential in your region
